name: LOST MAGE FOUND UNDER THE SEA
text:
LOST MAGE FOUND ALIVE DEEP BENEATH ABECEAN SEA

In a shocking twist on a weeks-old cold case, the missing mage Divides-To-Iron has been found alive by a fellow member of the Mages Guild. The Argonian left on a solo expedition into a seafloor Ayleid ruin near the Mykoi Isles of the northern Abecean Sea, but failed to return at the expected time.

According to reports from the Mages Guild, Divides-To-Iron became trapped in a one-way passage deep inside the Ayleid ruin, which he identified as "Nagaiarelle". When a Mages Guild %PCRace finally found him, the mage had been living on a diet of fish and a dwindling supply of fresh water for more than three weeks. Because of his unique Argonian physiology, Divides-To-Iron was able to breathe in the ruin's depths, though the salt water made this exhausting.

Despite these difficulties, Divides-To-Iron appears to have taken his ordeal in good humor, telling the Monitor he "loves seafood". The Mages Guild made no comment on its future plans regarding explorations of Nagaiarelle.
